name: Benazio Royale
description:
The deck is stacked against you as Antonio Benazio, Craps Dealer extraordinaire, fights to stop 'The Ace of Spades' and his suit of minions from taking over the illustrious Benazio Casino. Grab your magical dice, craft them together, and use them as weapons to fight through waves of The Ace of Spade's goons.

Use W, A, S, D to move Antonio around the arena. Gather your dice from the pedestals in the center of the arena and open the crafting menu with 'E'. Combine smaller dice into bigger dice for extra PUNCH! You the mouse to aim and click to throw a die. Are you feeling lucky?

See if you can last all 7 rounds!
